sentences.sContent: Mrs. March gave the mother tea and gruel , and comforted her with promises of help, while she dressed the little baby as tenderly as if it had been her own.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mrs. March gave the mother tea and gruel , and comforted her with promises of help, while she dressed the little baby as tenderly as if it had been her own.
sentences.sCn: 马奇太太一边为做母亲的端茶递粥，一边安慰她，让她宽心，又像对待自己的亲生骨肉一样轻柔地为小宝宝穿上衣服。

sentences.sContent: The food was very simple-teachers ate millet gruel three times a day.
sentences.sContent_eng: The food was very simple-teachers ate millet gruel three times a day.
sentences.sCn: 吃的食物非常简单，老师一天三顿喝小米稀粥。

words.tran: 折磨人的；繁重累人的；使人精疲力尽的
使极度疲劳；累垮（gruel的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a food made of  oats  cooked in water or milk, which poor people ate in the past
